com.catchoom.api
Class CatchoomErrorResponseItem

java.lang.Object
  com.catchoom.api.CatchoomErrorResponseItem

public class CatchoomErrorResponseItem
extends java.lang.Object

CatchoomErrorResponseItem is used to comunicate to a CatchoomResponseHandler an error raised during a request.

Author:
Catchoom

getErrorDescription

public java.lang.String getErrorDescription()
Gets the Catchoom error description. Watch out: this error description should be used for debugging purposes only and not relay on it when implementing your own error handling system.

Returns:
